AffixDesc_Legendary: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 7% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 35%.
AffixDesc_Magic: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 25%.
AffixDesc_Rare: Monster attacks from a distance reduce your Armor by 6% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 30%.
